overview: Jon Brant is your average construction worker until one day he losses his job.. He gets a call from Mr. Walton who has had a guy watching Jon and offers him a job. When he goes to meet Mr.Walton they slip him a mickey and next thing you know he wakes up and is told he is going to be hunted along with three others for sports.
tagline: A game of death... A fight for survival
title: The Ultimate Prey
